name: Collect and Shoot
description:
Collect and Shoot is a short game where you collect coins to advance to the next level.  This game was made for the Vimlark Gamejam in one day due to personal things coming first.

- WASD to move
- SPACE to jump
- SHIFT + SPACE to dive
- L CLICK to shoot coins
- R CLICK to shoot magnets
- Q to buy more magnets
